00011 BOOLEAN LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(STR pFileName, STR16 pDestString, UINT32 uiSeekFrom, UINT32 uiSeekAmount)
00012 {
00013       HWFILE            hFile;
00014       UINT16            i;
00015       UINT32            uiBytesRead;
00016 
00017 
00018       hFile = FileOpen(pFileName, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE);
00019       if ( !hFile )
00020       {
00021             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "LoadEncryptedDataFromFile: Failed to FileOpen");
00022             return( FALSE );
00023       }
00024 
00025       if ( FileSeek( hFile, uiSeekFrom, FILE_SEEK_FROM_START ) == FALSE )
00026       {
00027             FileClose(hFile);
00028             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "LoadEncryptedDataFromFile: Failed FileSeek");
00029             return( FALSE );
00030       }
00031 
00032       if( !FileRead( hFile, pDestString, uiSeekAmount, &uiBytesRead) )
00033       {
00034             FileClose(hFile);
00035             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "LoadEncryptedDataFromFile: Failed FileRead");
00036             return( FALSE );
00037       }
00038 
00039       // Decrement, by 1, any value > 32
00040       for(i=0; (i<uiSeekAmount) && (pDestString[i] != 0); i++ )
00041       {
00042             if( pDestString[i] > 33 )
00043                   pDestString[i] -= 1;
00044             #ifdef POLISH
00045                   switch( pDestString[ i ] )
00046                   {
00047                         case 260:         pDestString[ i ] = 165;       break;
00048                         case 262:         pDestString[ i ] = 198;       break;
00049                         case 280:         pDestString[ i ] = 202;       break;
00050                         case 321:         pDestString[ i ] = 163;       break;
00051                         case 323:         pDestString[ i ] = 209;       break;
00052                         case 211:         pDestString[ i ] = 211;       break;
00053 
00054                         case 346:         pDestString[ i ] = 338;       break;
00055                         case 379:         pDestString[ i ] = 175;       break;
00056                         case 377:         pDestString[ i ] = 143;       break;
00057                         case 261:         pDestString[ i ] = 185;       break;
00058                         case 263:         pDestString[ i ] = 230;       break;
00059                         case 281:         pDestString[ i ] = 234;       break;
00060 
00061                         case 322:         pDestString[ i ] = 179;       break;
